item.title: Status and Ethnic Identity. A Study on First- and Second-Generation Migrants in Germany
item.description: Suggested Citation: Genoni, A. (2022). Status and Ethnic Identity. A Study on First- and Second-Generation Migrants in Germany. Verlag Barbara Budrich. https://doi.org/10.3224/84742575

item.title: Internationale Mobilität und Sozialstruktur
item.description: Suggested citation: Ette, A., Genoni, A., & Witte, N. (2021). Internationale Mobilität und Sozialstruktur. In Federal Statistical Office, Berlin Social Science Center and Federal Institute for Population Research (Eds.), Datenreport 2021. Ein Sozialbericht für die Bundesrepublik Deutschland (pp. 316–323). Bundeszentrale für politische Bildung.

item.title: Status transition in the educational system and well-being of migrant adolescents in cross-national comparison
item.description: Suggested Citation: Nauck, B., Genoni, A. (2019). Status transition in the educational system and well-being of migrant adolescents in cross-national comparison. Zeitschrift für Erziehungswissenschaft 22(S1), 47–69. https://doi.org/10.1007/s11618-019-00887-z
